snippet: TISHMAN--John L. The New York Building Congress Board of Directors is greatly saddened by the death of John L. Tishman, Chairman Emeritus of Tishman Realty & Construction Co., Inc., whom we remember as one of the fathers of modern construction management. He was a man of undisputed integrity and generosity and never wavered in his personal support of the institutions that make New York truly great. John was a leader in our industry and his legacy will live on through his iconic projects and philanthropic endeavors. Richard Cavallaro, Chairman Richard T. Anderson, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: TISHMAN--John L. The New York Building Congress Board of Directors is greatly saddened by the death of John L. Tishman, Chairman Emeritus of Tishman Realty & Construction Co., Inc., whom we remember as one of the fathers of modern construction management. He was a man of undisputed integrity and generosity and never wavered in his personal support of the institutions that make New York truly great. John was a leader in our industry and his legacy will live on through his iconic projects and philanthropic endeavors. Richard Cavallaro, Chairman Richard T. Anderson, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TISHMAN, JOHN L
